subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Allen York stopped 29 shots and earned his first N.H.L. win in an emergency start after Steve Mason was hurt at the morning skate, and host Columbus beat the Detroit Red Wings, 4-2.
snippet: Allen York stopped 29 shots and earned his first N.H.L. win in an emergency start after Steve Mason was hurt at the morning skate, and host Columbus beat the Detroit Red Wings, 4-2.
